Index.title: RealTWNOG
Index.subtitle: Taiwan Network Operators Group
Index.description: Taiwan Network Operators Group community, dedicated to providing a platform for network interconnection cooperation and technical exchange.
Index.mission_text: RealTWNOG aims to promote technical exchanges and cooperation among Taiwan network operators, establishing an open and shared professional community to enhance the stability and security of network infrastructure.
Index.whatWeDo_item3: Best practices discussions for network infrastructure
Index.whatWeDo_item4: Exploration of latest network technologies and trends

About.title: About Us
About.description: Learn about RealTWNOG's mission and history
About.history_text: RealTWNOG was founded in 2020 by a group of engineers passionate about network infrastructure, dedicated to establishing a local network operations exchange platform in Taiwan.
About.mission_text: To promote technical exchange and cooperation among Taiwan network operators, improving the quality and security of network infrastructure.
About.value1_text: We believe that the openness and sharing of knowledge can promote the progress of the entire industry.
About.value2_text: We value technical professionalism and are committed to providing high-quality technical content.
About.value3_text: We encourage cooperation and mutual assistance among members to jointly solve challenges in network operations.
About.history_2024: Became an important network technology exchange platform in Taiwan and established partnerships with international network organizations.
About.history_2025: Continued to promote network technology exchange and maintained partnerships with international network organizations.
About.commitment_1: Promoting technical exchange and cooperation among network operators
About.commitment_2: Providing guidance and resources for network technology best practices
About.commitment_3: Building a community network of network professionals in Taiwan
About.values_description: These core values guide all our activities and decisions, enabling us to better serve the community.

Members.description: Meet our community members and partners

Members.benefit4: Build industry connections and collaboration opportunities

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.description: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you
Contact.name: Name
Contact.subject: Subject
Contact.faq1_answer: Most events are free, but special workshops or seminars may charge a reasonable fee, with discounts typically available for members.
Contact.faq2_question: How can I become a speaker or share content?
Contact.faq2_answer: Please contact us through this form or Discord with your proposed topic and content outline.
